mapper.select: SELECT NO, WRITER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWS, UPLOAD_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT NO, WRITER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWS, UPLOAD_DATE FROM FAQ WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT NO, WRITER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT_IMG, UPLOAD_DATE, VIEWS FROM EVENT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT NO, WRITER_NO, CINEMA_NO, MANAGER_NO, RENTAL_DATE, UPLOAD_DATE FROM RENT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
